user_query: I want to plan a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I need to keep track of the stock market trends while organizing the event. Can you provide me with historical prices for the stock symbol AAPL from June 1st, 2022 to June 15th, 2022? Additionally, I would like to check the current server status of stocks_archive to ensure it is functioning properly.

TaskList.description: Check the current server status of the stocks_archive to ensure it is functioning properly.
Retrieve historical prices for the stock symbol AAPL from June 1st, 2022 to June 15th, 2022.
